name: WYRMHOLE
description:
It's the not-so-far future, and a new technology has just been invented - the ability to open wormholes to travel through both time and space. You are one of the first brave pioneers to use this new tech. There is only one goal in your mind - to go back 100 years and prevent a terrible war that decimates humanity. But what perils lie inside the wormhole?

Controls
DPad Left and Right (Arrow Keys) to move around the edge of the wormhole
A (X) to shoot
B (Z) to teleport to the opposite side

Credits
Music and SFX by Coffee Bat

Assets Used
Font
Enemies
Title Screen Image

Made with GBSDK

Would recommend downloading this one to play, it seems to lag a little in the online emulator for some reason.
